attributes.action: Enforce a strict rationing on food stuffs for all households via gov.uk website.
attributes.additional_details: Certain sections of society just aren't listening and are making it harder for everyone else. This then becomes self fulfilling.
attributes.background: Suggested amount would be £15 per head, per household, per week. This could be monitored and enforced using QR/Bar codes via a mobile phone app and scanned by the retailer. This would enable budgeting for those on lower incomes.
